thread.title: REACT RIGHT NOW ON THE DREADFUL KILLING OF THE 2 RHINO AT THULA THULA
thread.title_full: REACT RIGHT NOW ON THE DREADFUL KILLING OF THE 2 RHINO AT THULA THULA

title: REACT RIGHT NOW ON THE DREADFUL KILLING OF THE 2 RHINO AT THULA THULA
text: target: President ZUMA SOUTH AFRICA AND HIS DEPT OF THE ENVIRONMENT The slaughter and killing of our Jewels in our Crown the WHITE AND BLACK RHINO must stop.Poaching must stop. WE have seen that the number of rhinos killed is ever increasing contrary to Government figures ..and at the rate these killing are occurring we shall have no rhino left by 2021 .That means that our rhino will be extinct in wild life areas ..our grand children and their children will not see them .Income from tourism in the rural areas will no longer be available as their will be nothing to see ..The government is apparently about to permit the selling of horns which will increase since it's a means of earning money for the poachers . THIS MUST STOP ZUMA YOUR GOVERNMENT MUST NOW ISSUE REOLUTIONS AND NOTIFICATION THAT POACHERS WILL BE GIVEN HEAVY FINES AND LONG TERM JAIL SENTENCES ..YOUR GOVERNMENT MUST ENCOURAGE THAT POACHERS ARE REPORTED ON AND THE CORRUPTION IN YOUR DEPARTMENTS ADMINISTARATIONS POLICE FORCE AND IN THE JUDICIAL SYTEM MUST STOP
